tweets.text: Hillside tree planting in the Isbourne catchment. Not only will this help to take water out of the system via infiltration, but there will be many biodiversity benefits too!🌳#nfm #hillsidetreeplanting #slowtheflow @worcscc @EnvAgencyMids @isbournecatch @WoodlandsPower https://t.co/2jEX7xt2ec

@CarlCarljoynes @ScaniaGroup @ScaniaUK @RustyWarn @Andrew_Bentley @RustyWarner @Comm_Motor @MitchGough @davemor66816340 @pagietheyounger @anthonysmeed @andrew_long67 @RussKelly71 @RWKeltruck @SFletch8 @adam_freezer @RussBarnes84 @Motor_Transport @TRATON_GROUP @EnvAgency @GREATBritain @tradegovuk @tradegovuk_WM @NobbyH29 @madventuretour @StevieH47 A customer in the UK writes:

"Thank you very much for your efficiency & fast reply – we will definitely be using you as our new parts suppliers. Over the moon with the quote & service so far."

👏🏻 Henry Wood

#ScaniaVehicleRecycling #ScaniaParts #Scania https://t.co/tI7fLhLQM9

We’ve delivered our largest ever programme of #flood and coastal defence improvements!

Working with partners, we’ve helped protect over 300,000 homes from flooding and supported communities to become more resilient to #ClimateChange

Read more: https://t.co/5Bgax4pg9n

#FCERM https://t.co/mS2pKBFb18

A £42m project designed to better protect Hull from tidal flooding is nearing completion. The new defences, which stretch 7km from St Andrew’s Quay to Victoria Dock, are all now built - reducing flood risk for 113,000 homes & many businesses. Only landscaping work remains. https://t.co/VkkTQfipCY

tweets.text:
Massive props to @frazer_HX who leaves @EnvAgency this week for exciting new adventures. Keep an eye on this cat... 

Frazer has done more than nearly any human in the UK to advance emergency alerting to save lives.

Thanks mate. Hell of a legacy you're leaving behind... 🙌🏼

Our flood defences in #Mytholmroyd are just one of the many schemes that have helped us reach our target or 300,000 homes better protected from #flooding since 2015. This £41m scheme better protects 400 homes and businesses. 
#FCERM 
#Flood 
#ClimateChange https://t.co/70MVp4EW1K https://t.co/pL6DbQfEqz

Good to see that the @EnvAgencySE has followed up on the oil spillage in the #Silkstream which we reported earlier and are working to recover the oil from the stream and have placed another boom in the river to stop the oil from flowing on&polluting the Welsh Harp! @thameswater https://t.co/rRGE1aQL9A https://t.co/OBSa9JHOJI

urls.title: [Withdrawn] Apply for a grant from the natural environment investment readiness fund
urls.description: Grants to prepare innovative nature projects in England that can attract private financial investment. Find out what the fund is for and how to apply.

tweets.text:
This week is the last chance for your organisation to apply for a grant from the Natural Environment Investment Readiness Fund!

If you’re an organisation ready to restore the natural environment, apply now:https://t.co/TJnC6BasA7 https://t.co/AXQAk6DAbM

tweets.text: @AndynBrown16 @lepdavidnowell @EnvAgencyNW @EnvAgency How much wildlife was killed in the Ellet brook breach in 2015, water cannot get away and  Rufford was flooded,please meet meet me to discuss further

Tonight Channel 4 News and @UE reveal that Syngenta presented flawed safety data on Gramoxone.

And secret company documents suggest Syngenta had safer, more expensive alternatives that it held back from consumers to protect its profits – which the company deny.

tweets.text: It is time the UK had its own rewilding programme for eel in the UK depleted waters @EelGroup we are after support @RewildingB @BenGoldsmith @ScottishEPA @EnvAgency @WetlandsInt @Shoal_Org @WWTSlimbridge @WWFLeadWater @theriverstrust @WildlifeTrusts https://t.co/2t9R4HEbqH

Spent the morning planting 2,000 reeds with @cpvolgroup. Great team effort 😀 Looking forward to lots more volunteer events with the group in the future @CroxtethHall @EnvAgencyNW #ACCP #NFM https://t.co/njHfFZqOPZ

Dirty water from our homes should go to a water treatment works not into our rivers or seas. Wrongly connected pipes cause pollution and harm wildlife. Make sure you @connectrightUK #NationalDrainageMisconnectionDay #BinIt4Beaches #RainDownTheDrain. https://t.co/PLaKsIqCVi

Someone has dumped oil in the Silkstream! Might have been dumped from a garage! Spotted at various locations, including upstream from the bridge, just off Barnfield Rd(HA8)and at Silkstream Park! @EnvAgencySE https://t.co/vgYosqfMBq
@johncurtinEA @EnvAgency it will just flood somewhere else instead

The River Len at Palace Avenue, Maidstone choked by litter & fly-tipping. Though this wet dump is unsightly, it is invisible pollutants & man-made barriers (such as culverts and weirs) that inflict most harm on wildlife.🐟@rivercide_live @KeepBritainTidy @EnvAgency @maidstonebc https://t.co/wMLheOxBoj

What a fantastic achievement by our partner @EnvAgency - these projects are brilliant as they have multiple benefits for both people and the environment 👏👏

Fab to see the #NaturalFloodManagement #NFM work by @EnvAgencyNW at Smithills included too

https://t.co/4voKeRoEgO https://t.co/1tfyBwfVmX

We did it! Today we pass the target of 300000 homes better protected from flooding. Massive congrats to all involved. Here’s a taster of just four of the 700 schemes that were part of that success - but can you name them? https://t.co/5xFUVds5wU https://t.co/xtz5gGxeY6
@ThamesPathNT @EnvAgencySE @VisitThamesCoUk Cleeve Lock, just along from Streatley I think? Walked there today 😀

The #BostonBarrier is one of more than 700 @EnvAgency schemes which have contributed to better protecting 300,000 homes from flooding over the last 6 years. An incredible achievement & a credit to all of those who have worked to enhance the resilience of our communities. #TeamEA https://t.co/SKNVL6qqOe

300,000 homes are better protected from flooding, and the #flood defence in #Cannington #Somerset protects 200 of them. The flood bypass channel takes excess flood water away from the village and reduces flood risk to the A39. It was completed in 2017 at a cost of £4.5 million. https://t.co/WPX35U8DJo

So how does this affect the water supply and waterways in the Greater Cambridge area? Towns being built on ex RAF airfields? Operational airfields? Leachate from refuse tips? @EnvAgency @Cambswater @AnglianWater @CamLabEF @FewsLane @CambridgeIndy https://t.co/JNsWqC5HJx

Do you know where the water from your dishwasher, washing machine, bath or shower goes? 

Misconnected properties can pollute rivers and seas and harm wildlife. Check your property is connected right. 

For more info https://t.co/hKtRdkmPtK 

#NationalDrainageMisconnectionDay https://t.co/IJ9CzszydQ

An investigation by the @EnvAgency found David and Nicholas Channer "continually put the environment at risk".

tweets.text:
Today, we have hit our target of protecting more than 300,000 homes nationally from the risk of #flooding & coastal erosion! 

Here are our local flood risk managers to explain what we have achieved in the #NorthWest & what we will do to protect communities in the next 6 years https://t.co/mNV3dnmPfJ

Media coverage isn’t part of the justice system...

... but a consequence of it...

... and here is @itvmeridian’s take on the conviction of two #Buckinghamshire men...

... we prosecuted for burning waste illegally 

Watch video of the fire 🎥🔥⬇️ https://t.co/Cp3WkOEtuZ

tweets.text: @EnvAgencyYNE Cannot reach website!

New flood defences near Cardigan Fields on the Kirkstall Road are taking shape. 

Pre made concrete units are being installed to reduce flood risk to businesses in the area. The materials are sourced in the UK to reduce our carbon footprint.

#Leeds #flooding https://t.co/wF5rwi2pZJ

Plans to create a large ‘aquagreen’ to store flood water and reduce flood risk to homes and businesses near #Bransholme in east #Hull have been submitted for planning approval: https://t.co/ixoeFn7pmV @hullccnews @East_Riding @HumberLEP @EnvAgency @OliverHarmarEA @HighwaysYORKS

We are excited to announce that our oyster nursery locations in #TyneandWear are... Sunderland Marina and @PortofBlyth! Thanks to both sites for hosting us, and to our delivery partners @GWKNE & @EnvAgencyYNE, helping to restore oysters in North East England. #WildOysters 🙌 https://t.co/T5cSTp2Z2c

READ: A father and son from #Buckinghamshire have been given #prison terms for illegally storing and burning #waste...

They ignored the law on safe disposal of rubbish... But they couldn't ignore our crime officers and the court...

#NicholasChanner... #DavidChanner
#legalnews https://t.co/JKwSvSfBbK

300,000 homes in England are now better protected against flooding. 27,000 of those homes are in the South West, including the  #Helston flood alleviation scheme in #Cornwall which provides increased protection for 121 homes. #FCERM #TeamEA https://t.co/1z6QDFYyBo https://t.co/qqAk6vI7Y3
Here in the south west, we have better protected 27,000 of the 300,000 homes against #flooding. A huge achievement #TeamEA https://t.co/UJWO5G5FTY

@MerryAlbright @Feargal_Sharkey @timthefruit @EnvAgency True to his word Danny Kruger is indeed taking up the issue of phosphates and sewage in our rivers: His latest newsletter: https://t.co/k53fbzTCGT
He generously says I'm an expert on sewage.  Seriously, I'm not, but my professional experience helps with the Law and Regulations.

tweets.text: Since 2015, @EnvAgency & partners have built >700 projects to better protect >300,000 homes; new defences make ~600,000 acres of farmland, 000's of businesses & major infrastructure more resilient to climate change, saving the economy >£28 billion avoided flood damages. #FCERM https://t.co/7aLv9sNtwp
